instruction: This is a open-ended generation task. GPT model should generate an appropriate output for the instruction
input: How to prepare for a job interview
output: To best prepare for a job interview, research the company you are interviewing with, prepare a list of questions to ask the interviewer, understand what you are looking for in the job, create a list of your accomplishments that can be related to the job, practice answering common interview questions, and dress appropriately. Rehearse your introduction and aim to make a positive impression on the interviewer. Be sure to thank the interviewer for their time and express your interest in the position.
